title: Goodman Networks Loses DirecTV Contract, Tanking Bonds
sub_head: AT&T subsidiary DirecTV terminates contract over concerns about Goodman’s liquidity and debt
body:
Goodman Networks Inc. lost a home service provider contract with DirecTV LLC that generates the bulk of the wireless infrastructure company’s earnings, according to people familiar with the matter.
AT&T Inc.’s DirecTV is Goodman’s largest customer, having generated roughly $100 million in revenue for the company last year, or 80% of Goodman’s revenue, according to a company disclosure to investors, the people said.
The...
